text: Rasputin, the Mad Monk is a 1966 British Hammer horror movie directed by Don Sharp and stars Christopher Lee, Barbara Shelley, Francis Matthews, Richard Pasco, Suzan Farmer, Brian Wilde, Joss Ackland, Bryan Marshall. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1966 horror movies Category:1960s biographical movies Category:1960s historical movies Category:British biographical movies Category:British horror movies Category:Movies directed by Don Sharp Category:Movies set in the 1900s Category:Movies set in the 1910s Category:Movies set in Saint Petersburg Category:Movies set in Russia
title: Rasputin, the Mad Monk
